summary: A command‑line script that builds and trains a Graph Attention Network on standard citation graph datasets (Cora, Citeseer, Pubmed) using DGL and PyTorch, handling data loading, model construction, training iterations, and performance reporting.
business_intent: Provide a ready‑to‑run example for researchers and developers to experiment with graph attention models for node classification, serving as a reference implementation and benchmark for graph neural network applications.
